summary.para: Obtains an enumerator that contains all lattice elements contained in the lattice property that start at or after a specific offset from the start of the frame.

param.name: dwFrameStart
param.para: Specifies the offset, in 100-nanosecond units, relative to the start of the phrase, of the first element to obtain.

param.name: rguidType
param.para: Specifies the lattice type identifier. This can be one of the Lattice Type values.

param.name: ppEnum
param.para: Pointer to an interface pointer that receives the enumerator object.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

item.description: rguidType is unsupported by the lattice property.

summary.para: Determines if a specific lattice element type is supported by the lattice property.

param.name: rguidType
param.para: Specifies the lattice type identifier. This can be one of the Lattice Type values.

param.name: pfSupported
param.para: Pointer to a BOOL that receives a value that indicates if the lattice type is supported. If the lattice type is supported, this parameter receives a nonzero value and the method returns S_OK. If the lattice type is unsupported, this parameter receives zero and the method returns E_INVALIDARG.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

description.para: The specified lattice type is supported.
Either pfSupported is invalid or the specified lattice type is not supported.

summary.para: The ITfLMLattice interface is implemented by the speech text service to provide information about lattice element properties and is used by a client (application or other text service). A client obtains this interface from the GUID_PROP_LMLATTICE property by calling . For more information, see Predefined Properties.
